Detailed Description

Service class providing data to the config manager on the client

qcl_config_manager::method_create ( $  params  ) 

creates a config property, overwriting any previous entry requires permission "qcl.config.permissions.manage"

Parameters:
string $params[1]->name The name of the property (i.e., myapplication.config.locale)
string $params[1]->type The type of the property (string|number|object|boolean)
string $params[1]->permissionRead The permission name that is needed to access and read this property (optional)
string $params[1]->permissionWrite The permission name that is needed to access and read this property (optional)
boolean $params[1]->allowUserVariants If true, allow users to create their own variant of the configuration setting
Returns:
true if success

qcl_config_manager::method_set ( $  params  ) 

sets config property

Parameters:
string $params[0] The name of the property (i.e., myapplication.config.locale)
string $params[1] The value of the property.
boolean $params[3] If true, set the key's default value for keys that allow user variants. This is necessary so that the admin can change the defaults instead of editing her/his own variant.
Returns:
true if success
